title: GAN for Pathology Segmentation
abstract: We use GANs to improve segmentation accuracy in medical imaging.

title: Transformers for Drug Discovery
abstract: Transformer models accelerate molecule prediction in pharma pipelines.

title: Graph Neural Networks for Proteins
abstract: GNNs model complex protein interactions for structure prediction.

title: CycleGAN in Radiology Image Translation
abstract: CycleGANs help convert MRI to CT scans without paired data.

title: LLMs for Medical Question Answering
abstract: Large Language Models answer patient questions with high relevance.

title: Diffusion Models in Brain Imaging
abstract: We apply diffusion-based generative models to synthesize MRI images.

title: Knowledge Graphs for Biomedical Literature
abstract: Integrating biomedical entities with graph databases for better retrieval.

title: AI in Clinical Trial Optimization
abstract: AI models are used to predict trial outcomes and patient dropout.

title: Self-Supervised Learning in Histopathology
abstract: Using SSL techniques to extract features from unlabeled histology images.

title: Multimodal Models for Healthcare
abstract: Combining image, text, and tabular data for diagnosis prediction.
